english.segment2: I can never hide away in a place that you won't see. Caught between the way I am and the way I wanna be. You can take away the mask that hides the man inside. You illuminate the ways of darkness I deny
english.segment3: And even though you see, You keep on lifting me
english.segment4: Till everything I do, I do for you. Through every test of faith You take me through. Till every path I take is straight and true. Till everything I do, I do for you
english.segment5: One by one you chip away at the edges of my heart. Till you see the hardness and the willfulness depart
english.segment6: You let me see my pride, then pull me to your side
english.segment7: Till everything I do, I do for you. Through every test of faith You take me through. Till every path I take is straight and true. Till everything I do, I do for you
english.segment8: Though I grow closer to the end that you intend for me. I won't be all I'm meant to me. Till face to face I see
english.segment9: Till everything I do, I do for you. Through every test of faith You take me through. Till every path I take is straight and true. Till everything I do, I do for you.
